en.title: FE Donates RM 20,000 to Women's Aid Organisation!
en.content: FE continues to help the less fortunate of society. At FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner on 28th February 2009, FE presented a mockup cheque of RM 20,000 to Annie Varghese from the Women's Aid Organisation. You can read about their plight in the Star newspaper article below. FE hopes that by helping and setting a good example more of FE's successful leaders will do the same and help the less fortunate of society and make the world a better place for all.
